title: please add lock feature before the shutdown the phone and launching app.
content:
Like the feature, we have on one plus devices as I want in my pixel 3 to lock app feature natively.

A most important feature, ask for unlocking or security check before the shutdown the phone to prevent the thief to steal. 

please google pixel experience adds the feature "Hide app", "app locker" and the most "shutdown lock".
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
